implements a set of functionality in the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a></code> class for targets that make use of the independent code generator (CodeGen) library. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegentargetmachineimpl/#details">More...</a>

## Public Member Functions

### addPassesToEmitFile() {#ac9ec6dcf573b94dece0bcd8511579e4d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool DirectXTargetMachine::addPassesToEmitFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanagerbase">PassManagerBase</a> &amp; PM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-pwrite-stream">raw&#95;pwrite&#95;stream</a> &amp; Out, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-pwrite-stream">raw&#95;pwrite&#95;stream</a> &#42; DwoOut, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a73b761f8d40500a5a28889569526b260">CodeGenFileType</a> FileType, bool DisableVerify, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfowrapperpass">MachineModuleInfoWrapperPass</a> &#42; MMIWP)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Add passes to the specified pass manager to get the specified file emitted.

Typically this will involve several steps of code generation. <code>MMIWP</code> is an optional parameter that, if set to non-nullptr, will be used to set the MachineModuloInfo for this PM.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-h/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-h">DirectXTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-cpp/#l00131">131</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-cpp">DirectXTargetMachine.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### addPassesToEmitMC() {#af1fa9db23b9346cbce69e6842e4ef6e4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool DirectXTargetMachine::addPassesToEmitMC (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanagerbase">PassManagerBase</a> &amp; PM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &#42;&amp; Ctx, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-pwrite-stream">raw&#95;pwrite&#95;stream</a> &amp; Out, bool DisableVerify)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Add passes to the specified pass manager to get machine code emitted with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcjit">MCJIT</a>.

addPassesToEmitMC - Add passes to the specified pass manager to get machine code emitted with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcjit">MCJIT</a>.

This method returns true if machine code is not supported. It fills the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> Ctx pointer which can be used to build custom <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer">MCStreamer</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-h">DirectXTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-cpp/#l00165">165</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-cpp">DirectXTargetMachine.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createPassConfig() {#a34bed5e861468e6960983cbc1479cfeb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>TargetPassConfig &#42; DirectXTargetMachine::createPassConfig (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanagerbase">PassManagerBase</a> &amp; PM)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Create a pass configuration object to be used by addPassToEmitX methods for generating a pipeline of CodeGen passes.

createPassConfig - Create a pass configuration object to be used by addPassToEmitX methods for generating a pipeline of CodeGen passes.

Targets may override this to extend <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig">TargetPassConfig</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-h/#l00043">43</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-h">DirectXTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-cpp/#l00172">172</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/directxtargetmachine-cpp">DirectXTargetMachine.cpp</a>.

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Get a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> implementation for the target.

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a> returned uses the common code generator to answer queries about the IR.
